title: You idiot! Why would you build armor against a full AP team!?
body:
(Presses tab and checks our team's items.)

Me: I'm sorry but. . . .
https://media.giphy.com/media/A6KqfqtRvbDBS/giphy.gif

replies.body: "Things people would never say in order to fit the purposes of my forced joke" - The Post
You must be fun at parties.
Even better at funerals.

I guess he puts the "fun" in funeral.

I'll be taking my leave now. Put down that pitchfork.
Ill upvote just because ive seen it before
upvote just for leaving
You also sound fun at parties.

holy fk the downvote is real LOL
nops,all i did i say thnx ''I'll be taking my leave now.''
Funny how you try to cover up what you said without even trying to edit the original comment. But that's fine, we all get misunderstood from time to time.

> [{quoted}](name=IronSolariLeona,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=twr3OQTE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-12T13:59:31.797+0000)
>
> "Things people would never say in order to fit the purposes of my forced joke" - The Post

if only we could block certain boards, i would definitely block the memes board
Well you could just, you know, not go to the memes board?

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=twr3OQTE,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2015-10-12T18:32:28.859+0000)
>
> Well you could just, you know, not go to the memes board?

that's pretty hard to do when its on the front page

When it takes up almost 1/3 of the front page.
. . . You can always tell when certain people are on . . .

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=twr3OQTE,comment-id=00010002000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-12T18:53:10.422+0000)
>
> When it takes up almost 1/3 of the front page.
> . . . You can always tell when certain people are on . . .

that's what gets me the most when you go on the front page and 15 threads are from the memes board
Better than 15 separate threads calling to nerf Vayne.

There's this thing called going to the sub-boards... It's what people who don't just troll the front page do.

You should try it.
http://i1207.photobucket.com/albums/bb475/girlygurl3/tumblr_lifva5NaH51qczjnio1_500.gif
but it so funi hahehuaehueauhaehueahu

What the fuck do you think comedians do

I personally think you are way to cynical and nobody wants you here

Go to reddit where you belong
HAHAH {{item:3110}}
http://img.ifcdn.com/images/cbcfdce3f1328359e834611d49fe370b1bd420cfce3f16ecb559e7c330bcf2c8_1.gif
and kept the group laughing cus of his laughing xD
That's me...  Im the heieyna..

Armor lets you tower dive. Duh.

Towers are worthless once you have a little armor.

{{champion:75}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:36}} 

All dancing under towers.
While dying to the enemies defending them.
After four years of playing league I think I know that lol. Remember this is a joke thread, not a gameplay and balance thread.
{{champion:54}} {{champion:33}} Not like armor is one of our major offensive stats and lets us dive like gods
{{item:3110}} {{champion:44}} gems are truly truly outrageous

"Darius build a thornmail, Kats' ult keeps deleting us in teamfights"
-Top Lane Caitlyn

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXzEcwYs8Eo

I played Morderkaiser top (Back in the day) and was destroying the enemy laner. He comes back with cloth.
"Alright, he must be building into something."
Proceed to kill him and demolish him further.
Eventually I start roaming and killing other lanes- I see him up by his base turret and he's got chainmail.
I feel bad and type in all-chat.
"Bro, build MR- armor doesn't do anything to me."
Was totally ignored by him and yelled at by the rest of his team.

We won that game.

i love this movie

i cant wait for the second one i also have to watch Frozen Fever

Had a sion in aram fist built sunfire against an all ap team. When I called him out on it he said

 "so? The passive deals a lot of damage"

Me- "it doesn't deal damage if you're dead, should have built mr"

Sion - "shut up You stupid noob, I know what im doing"


We lost because he got melted every time he went in before he could land cc. The killed him mid ult once...

Kinda reminds me of a story when I asked my mid Katarina why she had a cloth armor against a full AP team, as politely as possibly. Literally my entire team, with the exception of Kat, started yelling at me for talking down to "bad" players. The Kat just told me it was for Zhonia's, and we went on our merry way. Flash forward to late game, and my team is yelling at me for not TPing well.

Well... you shouldn't be questioning tier 1 defense items. 
If that cloth armor had become a Randuin's, then there's a problem.
However, she was very obviously building into Zhonya's.
I don't play mid very often, so it was just a brain fart that I forgot that Zhonia's was there.
I can't handle these punts.
But I need dat Frozen Heart to stop Fizz's W rite?
Their autoattacks! They hurt!
I guess the teammate got freezer burned! :D
But.... Malphite passive likes armor.
